Question: I need help with SAP deployment
What can I type?
Answer: Please type in your error or question about SAP deployment automation.

Question: Error Incorrect paramter file
Answer: Please ensure that you are passing in the correct location of the parameter file. Ensure that you are in the specified directory when deploying each phase.

Question: Can I create multiple SIDs?
Answer: You cannot create multiple SIDs at the same time with the SAP deployment automation framework at this time.

Question: How do I customize my naming convention?
Answer: Customizing the naming convention is documented here: \n https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/workloads/sap/automation-naming-module

Question: Error checking for existing secret
Answer: Ensure that the deployment SPN has permissions.

Question: Error authorization/roleassignment.client#create error
Answer: Ensure that you are passing the correct SPN App ID and Secret to the deployment command

Question: Error A resource with ID...already exists
Answer: You need to use advanced_state_management.sh script to import the current state: \n https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/workloads/sap/bash/automation-advanced_state_management#synopsis

Question: Multi-line commands are failing due to whitespace error
Answer: Ensure that your deployment commnads are well formed. Use an editor, if necessary, in order to format the commands prior to running them.

Question: Error executing /tmp/terraform_<ID>.sh Process exited with status 127
Answer: This is an issue with the line endings in the sap-automation/deploy/terraform/terraform-units/modules/sap_deployer/configure_deployer.sh file. Ensure that it is saved with LF line endings rather than CRLF line endings. If you open the repository in a Windows environment, the line ending may change to CRLF.

Question: Error buidling account...
Answer: Use the Az Logout and Az Login commands again to re-authenticate to Azure. Your session may have expired due to run times of the last phase.

Question: Error KeyVault Secret <secret name> does not existing
Answer: Ensure that the Deployer Resource Group Key Vault contains the following secrets: MGMT-subscription-id, MGMT-tenant-id, MGMT-client-id, MGMT-client-secret. Substitute your deployer environment name for MGMT, if necessary.

Question: Error either access key/SAS token or the resource group for the storage account must be specified/Auzre AD Authentication must be enabled
Answer: Ensure that you are passing in the correct parameter for the storage account name parameter.
